alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 07 at 10:44AM PST until January 07 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. For the Freeze Warning, Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected in rural areas. Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected in urban areas. * WHERE...Bakersfield, South End San Joaquin Valley, Southeast San Joaquin Valley, and Visalia - Porterville - Reedley. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until noon PST today. For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM Monday to 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Clouds banking up against the foothill areas will create hazardous driving conditions through the late morning hours with visibilities below 1/4 mile.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
